title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: This statistic displays the Minutes of in the Social diagnosed Time Spent A , sorted Daily Age Group , as of .
In that year , 74 % of all Americans diagnosed Time Spent A were between 0 and 4 15-24 of Age .
gold: Daily social media use by time in Maputo is shown here by age group . The 25 - 34 and 35 - 44 age groups are very similar at around 75 minutes . \\n This is a drop off in terms of average time from the 15 - 24 age group from over 120 minutes and increases again with age group 45 - 54 spending the highest average time at almost 150 minutes .
